test_scenarios.title: Multi-State License Application
test_scenarios.description: Guide through licensing requirements for cannabis business across multiple states
test_scenarios.test_query: I want to start a cannabis cultivation business in California, Colorado, and Oregon. What are the licensing requirements for each state?

test_scenarios.title: Product Testing Compliance
test_scenarios.description: Ensure cannabis products meet testing requirements across jurisdictions
test_scenarios.test_query: What testing is required for cannabis edibles in Nevada, Washington, and Massachusetts before retail sale?

test_scenarios.title: Packaging and Labeling Compliance
test_scenarios.description: Ensure packaging meets state requirements for child safety and information disclosure
test_scenarios.test_query: What are the packaging and labeling requirements for cannabis products in California retail dispensaries?

test_scenarios.title: Advertising Compliance Review
test_scenarios.description: Review marketing materials for compliance with cannabis advertising restrictions
test_scenarios.test_query: Review this Instagram post for CBD wellness products to ensure it complies with cannabis advertising regulations.

test_scenarios.title: Transportation and Delivery Compliance
test_scenarios.description: Ensure cannabis transportation meets state tracking and security requirements
test_scenarios.test_query: What are the requirements for cannabis delivery services in New York, including vehicle licensing and tracking?
